about_the_game:
This is a first-person simulation experience where players get a glimpse of managing a small electronic market.
The demo focuses on basic store operations such as product placement, restocking, and cashier management.

STORE MANAGEMENT


In this demo, you can organize and manage where products will be displayed, ensuring an efficient and visually appealing store layout.
Limited customization options are available to demonstrate how product arrangement impacts customer satisfaction.

GOODS SUPPLY


Order items using the in-game computer.
The demo features a limited product catalog to provide an introduction to stock management and product placement mechanics.

CASHIER


Move items between registers and process payments via cash or credit card.
In this demo, only one register is available, allowing you to experience basic cashier functions.

GROWING


Earn money and increase your level to expand your store.
Although the demo provides a simplified growth experience, it demonstrates the potential for store expansion in the full game.

DESIGN


As you progress, design and customize your store to fit your preferences.
Customization options in the demo are limited compared to the full version.

FINANCE


Manage your store's finances to ensure success.
The demo includes basic financial planning, but advanced features like loans and detailed budgeting are exclusive to the full game.

REST AND FOOD


Feed your character using nearby facilities and let them rest at the end of the day.
The demo offers limited character needs, giving a taste of daily life management.

DEMO LIMITATIONS


This demo provides a brief introduction to the core mechanics.
Advanced features such as full store expansion, in-depth financial management, and extended store development are only available in the full version.

name: Electronic Market Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-6600 / AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8600K / AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In this detailed demo, players manage and operate their own electronics store. Sell products, improve customer satisfaction, and aim to grow your store. Strategic decisions in store management, customer service, and finances are key to success.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Hindi
*languages with full audio support
